article_title: Xerox private exchange reports positive outcomes
article_text:
Data continues to roll in attesting to the efficacy of the private insurance exchange, an exchange modeled after those pioneered by the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act but operated by non-government and non-insurance firms.

One such exchange — the RightOpt private insurance exchange from Buck Consultants at Xerox — has reported impressive outcomes.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Dan Cook
article_metadata.description: Clients using the RightOpt private exchange from Buck Consultants at Xerox say they're seeing an average year-over-year decrease in claim cost per employee of 3.7 percent.

Data continues to roll in attesting to the efficacy of the private insurance exchange, an exchange modeled after those pioneered by the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act but operated by non-government and non-insurance firms.
